explains: v. 污染；玷污，毒害（contaminate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: There is a strong possibility that the cat contracted the condition by eating contaminated pet food.
sentences.cn: 有一种极大的可能性就是那只猫吃了受污染的宠物食品而染上了病。

sentences.en: When a carpet was contaminated, less than 1% of the bacteria were transferred.
sentences.cn: 当地毯被污染时，只有不到1%的细菌能被转移。

sentences.en: Scientists therefore propose using sunflowers for decontamination wherever there are radioactively contaminated ponds.
sentences.cn: 因此，科学家建议，只要有受放射性污染的池塘，就可以用向日葵来消毒。
